User Guide: iGesture Workbench - Tutorial
Batch Processing Tab Tutorial The Batch Processing Tab as shown in Figure 1 can be used to find the most suitable parameter values for the recognition algorithms. A batch configuration file has to be provided (more information can be found here), a gesture and test set have to be selected. A directory to put the batch processing report can be specified as well. After the batch process, the report is shown below.
Figure 1: Batch Processing Tab
